title: The Children of the mist
creator_credit: Conon Fraser, David H. Fowler and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Describes some of the problems of adjustment that the Maori and Polynesian islanders have, as they try to integrate into the European society of New Zealand, but still retain their tribal identity.
creator_credit_for_label: Conon Fraser, David H. Fowler and New Zealand National Film Unit
